about_the_game:
Jans Token Pack 24 - Heroes 5

More Heroes have arrived to fight the evil of your world! The Dragonborn and the Firbolg.
All Dragonborn tokens have a variation for each of the Dragon types that exist in our favourite RPG source book. The variations include different weapons and spells.
Included are Dragonborn in Full Plate Armor, Chain Mail, and Scale Mail. There is a Dragonborn Bard with a Lute, and a lightly armored Barbarian.
The Firbolg tokens include Druids, Rangers, and Barbarians.
Tokens Included:
  • Dragonborn  Spellcaster
  • Dragonborn  Bard
  • Dragonborn  Barbarian
  • Dragonborn  Scalemail Armor
  • Dragonborn  Leather Armor
  • Dragonborn  Chainmail Armor
  • Dragonborn Plate Armor
  • Firbolg Druid Male/Female
  • Firbolg Ranger Male/Female
  • Firbolg Barbarian Male
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jan Loos

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
